sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_workflow_model ( id char(32) not null, modelname varchar2(64 char) not null, modeltext varchar2(128 char), status number(4) not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar2(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, processcount number(11) not null, unique(modelname), primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_process ( id char(32) not null, modelid char(32) not null, modelname varchar2(64 char) not null, title varchar2(128 char), version varchar2(16 char) not null, status number(4) not null, userid char(32), deptid char(32), domainid varchar2(32 char), usertext varchar2(32 char), createdate timestamp not null, roleid char(32), completedate timestamp, properties clob, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_delegation ( id char(32) not null, delegationsource number(4) not null, sourceid char(32) not null, status number(4) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar2(32) not null, startdate timestamp, completedate timestamp, dstartdate timestamp, dcompletedate timestamp, rulehandler varchar2(128 char), description varchar2(256 char), primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_activity ( id char(32) not null, processid char(32) not null, previousid char(32), tasknodeid char(32) not null, tasknodetext varchar2(64) not null, tasknodetype number(4) not null, status number(4) not null, createdate timestamp not null, completedate timestamp, timeoutdate timestamp, properties clob, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_workitem ( id char(32) not null, processid char(32) not null, activityid char(32) not null, status number(4) not null, roleid char(32) not null, deptid char(32), userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar2(32) not null, userid2 char(32) not null, usertext2 varchar2(32), createdate timestamp not null, completedate timestamp, readmark number(1) not null, readdate timestamp, topmark number(1) not null, retakeref char(32), ext1 varchar2(64 char), ext2 number(11) not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_variable ( id char(32) not null, variablesource number(4) not null, sourceid char(32) not null, variablename varchar2(32 char) not null, stringvalue varchar2(128 char), clobvalue clob, unique(variablesource, sourceid, variablename), primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_variable_log ( id char(32) not null, variableid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, stringvalue varchar2(128 char), clobvalue clob, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_comment ( id char(32) not null, contentid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, workitemid char(32) not null, deptid char(32) not null, taskname varchar2(64 char) not null, ccomment clob not null, primary key(id) );

create table sf_workflow_comment_log ( id char(32) not null, commentid char(32) not null, createdate timestamp not null, userid char(32) not null, logtype number(4) not null, ccomment clob not null, primary key(id) );
